ellie_nfts.text:
Hyperliquid Memecoins VS. Solana Memecoins

I guess last night’s Hypio space inspired me to write more about my current meme coin trading experience.
This isn’t a post to start a war, it’s just my thoughts. Don't take it personal - I'm not fudding your bags. I also got rugged here.

1/ Sol Meme Coins
I’ve been trading memes for a few years, started with ETH/BSC/other ecosystems, and mostly on Solana.
Sadly, the trenches are now completely cooked. Solana has become a playground for insiders and jeeters only.
And let’s not forget Wintermute's amazing role in dumping a bunch of tokens.

1.1/ The Launch of https://t.co/rby9mJySGk
Recently, https://t.co/rby9mJySGk launched with a 6-figure airdrop campaign for top yappers/KOLs.
The requirements? They need to launch a token and hit market cap milestones to reduce unlock times (200k -> 500k -> 1.25M -> 5M MC).

I’ve always believed community is the soul of any project, especially meme coins. And yeah, tier 1 and tier 2 KOLs have a natural edge here: they understand meme culture, they have reach, followers and they can rally a following better than your average dev or normie.

The results? Kinda tragic: https://t.co/Tal7g2Qemo

ATH of the biggest token launched by a tier 1 KOL was $14M -> now sitting at $200k.

$BETTY, one of the earliest projects, hit ~$8M on day one -> $2M on day two -> now $170k.

80% of tokens launched on Boop die within hours. The other 20% survive 2–4 days, if lucky.

I don’t blame the KOLs, many were transparent about only launching for the airdrop.
Some even got support from Boop’s founder, yet still couldn’t survive.
Turns out, even top influencers can’t bring liquidity to Sol meme coins anymore.

1.2/ The Current Sol Meme Landscape
Over the past few weeks, no token has been strong enough to lead the narrative.

We had #HOUSECOIN, supported by big names, but even with solid community support, it still couldn’t break $120M MC. It's still one of the most promising Sol meme coins rn tho. 
The coins riding on its hype barely last 1–3 days.

Then came #CHILLHOUSE - one of the better ones,  backed by Based, peaked at $10M, now sitting at $2M.
Still not even close.

And $GORK - a whole mess of variations. Elon Musk even changed his name and PFP to promote it.
The result? A 15–30 minute pump, then a slow, quiet death. Then another 5 - 10 $GORK were launching, no one knows which one is the real one.
Other Gork meta like $FUCKCOIN and $HORNI dropped 90%.
Even Elon couldn’t save them.

And then came $POPE, a "crime token" launched by the $TRUMP team. From $400M -> $50M, with no real pump. People didn’t even bother buying it.

Things got extra spicy with the Zerebro dev’s fake suicide stunt.
He faked his death, launched #LLJEFFY to celebrate it, dumped $ZEREBRO, bought into his own “legacy token”…
And #LLJEFFY did a 100x. Then dumped 90% after Irene exposed that he was still alive.

People really out here tokenizing their own death for a bag?????????? Seriously?
But even that narrative only lasted 2-3 days.

Right now? No real narrative on Sol.
Every day brings a new token, a quick pump for 1–3 days, then onto the next one.
No $WIF, no $BONK. People jeet their bags after a 10% gain.
If their coin doesn’t pump in 5 minutes, they’re out.
Only insiders are winning here.

PEOPLE. CAN. NOT. HOLD.

There’s no real liquidity, no new users, and no narrative.
The trenches are cooked.
BTC is heading toward $100K - meanwhile, Sol memes are just bleeding.

2/ Hyperliquid Meme Coins
Meanwhile, the Hyperliquid meme coin scene is still early - fresh trenches.
It started with HypurrFun, where a lot of people made money.

Now it’s HyperEVM season.
$BUDDY was the first meme on HyperEVM, and tbh it’s always the strongest.

I’m genuinely shocked by what $BUDDY has achieved.
Even with 73% of the supply airdropped to the Hyperliquid community and projects, the chart just keeps going up while the rest of the market bleeds.
People keep buying, and Hypios are working together to support it.
“Alright buddy” is basically culture now, alongside “Hypio.”

The difference is clear:
You can’t hold a Sol meme coin longer than a day (if you’re lucky).
But you can hold Hyperliquid meme coins and feel so comfy about it.
It’s a no-brainer.

On Hyperliquid, people genuinely support each other.

$BUDDY is leading the narrative, and $RUB is following.
When I first checked my $RUB airdrop, it was worth $150.
A few weeks later? $1000.
Now? $2500.

It reminds me of the early ETH meme days when communities were strong and holders had actual diamond hands.

So yup, I’m not selling my $EVM and $LUBE airdrops right now.
This is clearly just the beginning of the airdrop narrative.

Hyperliquid isn’t a playground for scammers, insiders, or cabals.
If someone asked me the best chain to build on right now, I wouldn’t hesitate cuz it’s 100% Hyperliquid.

If I had just stuck 100% with Hyperliquid, I wouldn’t be losing sleep staring at charts and watching Sol trenches crumble 24/7.

Hyperliquid.

Banner by @baynPSD
ellie_nfts.name: ellie.hl

ellie_nfts.text:
HyperXplore #2 - Pocket Pro @pp_trading 
*Sign up with my referral link for 10% off fees: https://t.co/NfJ672x7Ov

A lot of people have asked me: what's the best strategy to make money/farm airdrops?
For me, the answer is being early, especially when you’re starting with low capital.
More and more projects are launching on Hyperliquid, and this could be your chance to be early. So I’m gonna share some of my experience using new products on HL.

1/ What is Pocket Pro? Why Did I Choose to Use Pocket Pro?
Simple. I trade Hyperliquid perps, and I ape into Solana meme coins a lot. Pocket Pro offers both in one place. I can literally trade from anywhere: Telegram bot, directly on X, and soon on iOS.
Another big reason: solid rewards and cheap fees.
Here’s why I like it:
- Referral Rewards:
+ 20% ref fees when you refer perps traders.
+ 35% ref when you refer meme traders.
- Tips: Earn 20% of the profits when someone copies your trades.
- Low Trading fee: 30% lower than average, with free imported API wallets.

2/ Pocket Pro Features
Here’s what I’ve tested so far:
2.1/ Hyperliquid Perps
- Deposit from Arbitrum or Solana
- Long/short any tokens available on Hyperliquid L1
2.2/ Copytrade on both Hyperliquid Perps and SOL memes
- Follow top traders with /leaderboards
- Choose to follow all, or filter by “Top Copy Profits” or “Top Copied”
- Click any trader’s name to view their profile and copy their trades
2.3/ Trade on X
- Use the “Link X” command or /link to connect your handle
- Post or comment on X, then add a command like “/long btc 20x $20 @pp_trading"
2.2/ Solana Meme Trading
- Deposit $SOL to your Pocket Pro Solana wallet
- Post any $ticker or CA to get token info
- Buy and sell memes and perps instantly in Telegram
- Get alerted when tokens you post go up
2.4/ Trade With Friends
- Add PP bot to your group chat
- Post any $TICKER/CA and /long or /short to get info
- Get Notified when anyone opens a Perps position
- Buy and Ape Directly in the group chat
- Get Price Alerts when positions posted go up
- Follow and Copy Top Traders with /leaderboards
2.5/ Mobile App
- Still in private beta and folks can get on the list by signing up on https://t.co/NOcySZF3gZ

3/ How to Use PP and Maximize Rewards?
Step 1: Join https://t.co/NfJ672x7Ov
- Use the built-in wallet or import your own
Step 2: Deposit funds
- There’re two wallets: one for Solana memes, one for Hyperliquid perps.
- Click /Start → choose “Memes” or “Perps” 
- Deposit $SOL to Meme wallet and USDC/SOL to Perps wallet (minimum $15), then click “💸 Bridge”
Step 3: Use /leaderboard to follow top traders
- Start copytrading with small amounts
Step 4: Buy memecoins or trade perps directly on TG: /long, /short, /buy, /sell 
Step 5: Add the trading bot to your group chat
Step 6: Invite your friends -> Earn 20% - 35% of their trading fees
Step 7: Make a trade on X -> Earn 20% - 35% from people who trade through your post

Final Thoughts:
I’ll be more active starting this week and sharing more about what I’ve been doing in crypto.
This isn’t financial advice, and honestly, I’m not a good trader, and I get rugged everyday so don’t blindly copy me 🫠

That’s all for now. Thanks a lot for reading, and lmk if there are any new alphas you want me to try!
